channel.title: Security is my Life
channel.description: Recent content on Security is my Life

item.title: ShmooCon 2020: Cybersecurity Clubs & You
item.description: Dedicated students around the country have formed cybersecurity clubs to continue their learning outside of the classroom. These clubs have created communities focused on research, competing and celebrating a passion for security. In this talk we will cover the amazing things students are accomplishing and explain the different ways industry professionals can get involved.

item.title: How I went to a $4000 conference for free
item.description: We might be poor college students, but that doesn’t mean we should miss out on big security conferences. In fact, it is cheaper to go as a student! I will tell you how I have been to over 8 conferences in 2 years, all for free.

item.title: How to ask technical questions
item.description: Gabby Raymond gave this talk at WiCyS 2019. The information was so valuable that I had to I share it with the RITSEC community.

item.title: ISTS promo video
item.description: I produced, wrote and casted this promotional video for the RITSEC Information Security Talent Search.

item.title: OWASP TOP 5
item.description: A brief walkthrough and demo of the OWASP Top 5 web vulnerabilities

item.title: RITSEC Eboard Positions
item.description: A description of each RITSEC Eboard position written 10 minutes before it was presented!
